mapper.insert: insert into wg_disclosure_info( indv_name, indv_company, indv_cert_type, indv_cert_num, indv_link_number, indv_post_code, indv_address, indv_email, org_name, org_code, org_legal_person, org_link_man, org_link_number, org_post_code, org_address, org_email, apply_date, info_of_gov, info_descriptor, get_info_way, get_info_media, info_usage, info_usage_remark, derate_expenses_reason, key_word, accept_no, apply_type, transfer_no ) values( #{indv_name}, #{indv_company}, #{indv_cert_type}, #{indv_cert_num}, #{indv_link_number}, #{indv_post_code}, #{indv_address}, #{indv_email}, #{org_name}, #{org_code}, #{org_legal_person}, #{org_link_man}, #{org_link_number}, #{org_post_code}, #{org_address}, #{org_email}, #{apply_date}, #{info_of_gov}, #{info_descriptor}, #{get_info_way}, #{get_info_media}, #{info_usage}, #{info_usage_remark}, #{derate_expenses_reason}, #{key_word}, #{accept_no}, #{apply_type}, #{transfer_no} )
